sourcing.instructions:

 Erbium: Obtain from rare earth metal suppliers (e.g., American Elements). 
 Indium: Buy from metal supply shops or online (e.g., OnlineMetals). 
 Yttrium: Available from chemical vendors or online rare earth material suppliers.

heating.raw_text:
